name: President Elect PRO
description:
The new President is here! More changes are coming!
- No In App Purchases.
- No ADS
- No internet connection needed to play.
- Early access sale price
- Collect Emilio coins, score, and beat the sore of your friends
- From an indie dev with a heart
- Enjoy
